channel.title: Engineers United on Engineers United Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Engineers United on Engineers United Docs

item.description: Get Involved # Getting started # The History of HackUNT It’s not required to know the history of HackUNT to get involved in it; nevertheless, it will give you perspective on where we started and where we are going. HackUNT History How to get involved # New Member I’m new… now what? # Read the documentation on your role in the HackUNT/roles/ section Coordinate with the president about what is needed from you Attend the meetings Have fun, and enjoy the experience!

Our Git Workflows # Setting up git on your system # Linux Linux # For Fedora (or RPM-based distributions) # RUN sudo dnf install git-all For Debian-based distributions (such as Ubuntu) # RUN: sudo apt-get install git-all MacOS MacOS # If brew is already install in on your machine skip to Install git Install brew # RUN /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)" Install git # RUN brew update brew install git brew install git-gui Windows Windows # Download the office installer by going here Get fimilar with git # Git is the number one version control system in the world by useage.
